PositionHistory.Title: SR Network Engineer
SR Network Engineer
Network Engineer
JR Network Engineer

Competency.name: maintenance of PIX and ASA firewall systems
Implemented Net Scout Service Delivery Manager

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Siddharth Raj has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. Currently he is employed as a SR Network Engineer at Valence health. Siddharth has extensive knowledge of Cisco Switches/Routers, LAN/WAN > VLAN, OSPF (Open Shortest Path First), BGP (Border Gateway Protocol), LAN/WAN > LAN, VPN, EIGRP (Enhanced Interior Gateway Routing Protocol), TCP/IP, LAN/WAN > WAN, Router, Frame Relay, Dynamic Host Control protocol, Domain Name Server Protocol, Telnet, Sender Policy Framework, Secure Shell, SONET, MPLS (MultiProtocol Label Switching), LAN/WAN, Ethernet, Data Centre, DS1, Cisco Switches/Routers > Catalyst Switches, Cisco ASA, SIP, QoS (Quality of Service), Patch Panels, Nexus Technology, NOC, Microsoft Access, Internet Service, IOS, High Availability, HTTP, Digital Cross-Connect, DWDM, DSL, Cisco Pix Firewall, CheckPoint Firewall. So far Siddharth has not gained any managerial experience.
